titles: An answer to Dr. Stillingfleet's book of The unreasonableness of separation so far as it concerns The peaceable designe : with some animadversions upon the debate between him and Mr. Baxter concerning the national church and the head of it.
author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.
Humfrey, John, 1621-1719. Peaceable design.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691. Of national churches.
Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699. Unreasonableness of separation.
notes: Imprint date from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
